A young girl discovers a haunted doll in her grandmother's attic, and must confront the supernatural forces that have possessed it.
A doll possessed by a vengeful spirit terrorizes a small town, and a group of brave teenagers must unravel the mystery behind its curse.
A doll, once loved and cherished by a young girl, becomes the unwilling participant in a twisted game of cat and mouse with a serial killer.
A doll, crafted by a brilliant inventor, gains sentience and embarks on a journey through a futuristic city, encountering various obstacles and challenges along the way.
A doll, once belonging to a famous actress, comes to life and embarks on a mission to solve the mystery of her death and uncover the truth behind her untimely demise.
